(poor-amphibian [pooramphibian], pierce-resistant [pierceres], undead [undead], inanimate [inanimate], need-not-eat [neednoteat], spirit-sight [spiritsight])

item slots [slots]: 2 hands, head, body, feet, 2 misc
Admiral Torgrin was a true butcher during his life. When he was finally slain, he rose from the dead and continued slaughtering the living as one of the undead. His new state of unlife has made him even more powerful and he is now all but impossible to stop.
